House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07912
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE CATCHING SALE, PURCHASE, POSSESSION, TRANSPORTATION, IMPORTATION, AND EXPORTATION OF ALL SHARKS, RAYS, CHIMAERAS, OR ANY PART THEREOF IN THE COUNTRY
ABSTRACT : Provides for the conservation and protection of sharks, management of their threats, and creation of shark sanctuaries. Declares the following acts as illegal and penalizes the same: killing, taking, keeping in captivity, inflicting injury, harassing and trading vulnerable, threatened, endangered, or critically endangered species, and finning of sharks, among others.
ALIAS NAME : “Shark Conservation Act of the Philippines.”
